channel.title: Hoverbear Consulting
channel.description: A computer scientist working in open source towards a more hopeful future.

item.title: Photos: San Fransisco Trip
item.description:
A selection of images from my trip that I thought I'd share with the world.

If you want to use one of these for anything at all, just fire me an email and ask!

item.title: The Raft-rs Rust Meetup
item.description:
Wow. Was that ever fun! I hope that those that came had an equally enjoyable time and everyone got something useful out of it! I sure did!

Slides

  • Yvonne Coady
  • Diego Ongaro & Visualization
  • Ana Hobden
  • Dan Burkert
  • Alex Newman

item.title: Gathering Our Voices 2015
item.description:
Over the past two years I helped the BC Association of Aboriginal Friendship Centres host Gathering Our Voices, the largest annual Youth Conference in BC.

This year, I helped out again! I also teamed up with Science Venture again to host 4 workshops!

item.title: Gathering Our Voices 2014
item.description:
I played dual roles for Gathering Our Voices 2014. One role was with the B.C. Association of Aboriginal Friendship Centres, and the other was with Science Venture.

The purpose of these conferences is to unite youth from throughout the country in learning, healing and sharing and to provide tangible experiences of tools, resources and knowledge that the youth can bring back to their communities.

The conference had 1800 delegates and over 2000 participants.

item.title: Gathering Our Voices 2013
item.description: I helped plan and host the 11th Gathering Our Voices Aboriginal Youth Conference in Penticton, British Columbia. Much of my time was spent learning proper software design and refining the management and registration software I developed. This was my first 'real' software project.
